ing: 2 (15.25 ounce) cans fruit cocktail in light syrup, drained and liquid reserved
1 pint fresh strawberries, rinsed and sliced
1/2 honeydew melon, fruit removed with a melon baller
1/2 cantaloupe, fruit removed with a melon baller
des: "A creamy fruit salad made with cream cheese, canned fruit, fresh fruit and sweetened condensed milk.  I make this for picnics, barbeques and potlucks, it's usually the first dish that disappears."
ins: In a large bowl, cream together the cream cheese and sweetened condensed milk until smooth.  Mix in about 1/4 to 1/2 cup of the reserved fruit cocktail liquid.  Fold in the fruit cocktail, bananas, strawberries, honeydew and cantaloupe.  Serve immediately or chill until serving.
